entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lambda parameters are not checked for a number of error conditions #62960
  • Prefer interpretation of `scoped` as keyword whenever possible #62950
  • syncing namespaces often isn't worthwhile because the simplifier runs #62948
  • Convert to 'Program.Main' should preserve staticness of Program class #62943
  • EditorConfig UI 'place open brace *' options are not working #62942
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref structs #62940
  • `ForEachExplicitCastInSource` is missing from EditorConfig UI #62937
  • OperatorPlacementWhenWrapping should be moved to formatting options #62936
  • editorconfig has no highlighting #62935
  • Report error for type named `scoped` with language version 11 or later #62931
    17.4

Closed

  • Remove `ref scoped` #62338
    17.4
  • Remove tracking of unmatched `in` parameters in `GetInvocationEscapeScope()` and `CheckInvocationEscape()` #62834
  • AbstractRemoveUnnecessaryImportsDiagnosticAnalyzer should sub-type AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62638
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs in VS build 32725.281 #62934
  • [Automated] PRs in VS build #62933
  • Enable updated escape rules if `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields` exists #62131
    17.4
  • Automated test issue #62930

PullRequests

Created

  • Move option code over to using snapshots #62959
    Area-IDE
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Versions.props and PublishData.json for 17.4 P1 snap #62957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable source build for ASP.NET external access project #62956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove FailFast when rename tracking state is messed up #62955
    Area-IDE
  • Expose an internal export provider in the new solution snapshot helper #62954
    Area-IDE
  • Move "generic attributes" feature into C# 11 #62952
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete checks for IsInCommandLineMode #62951
    Area-IDE
  • Move code off of HostLanguageServices in favor of HostProjectServices. #62949
    Area-IDE
  • Use the threaded wait dialog when synchronously blocking rename #62946
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not working correctly with 'required' #62945
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Assert unnecessary analyzers derive from AbstractBuiltInUnnecessaryCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62944
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove prefer system hash code from EditorConfig UI #62939
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Ban SyntaxEditor constructor that takes HostWorkspaceServices. #62947
    Area-IDE, 17.4 P1

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62964
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62963
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62962
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #62961
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Issue delete and insert edits when changing parameters #62897
    Area-Interactive
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Don't report diagnostics if code-style option is disabled #62497
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge IBC data for .Net core binaries #61424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
